    save(Budget) - Method in class BudgetDatabase
    Adds a new budget to the database and persists it to file.
    save(Expense) - Method in class ExpenseDataBase
    Saves a new expense to the in-memory list and writes it to the file.

    Adds a new income record to the repository and persists it to file.

    Adds a new reminder to the database and persists it to file.
    Save1(User) - Static method in class UserDatabase
    Saves a user to the "Users.txt" file by appending their information.
    scheduleReminder(Reminder) - Method in interface IReminderNotification
    Schedules a new reminder notification to be delivered at the appropriate time.
    scheduleReminder(Reminder) - Method in class ReminderNotification
    Schedules a new reminder to trigger at the specified date/time.
